School necromancy; Level bloodrager 1, cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, hunter 1, mesmerist 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner 1, unchained Summoner 1, witch 1; Subdomain Plague 1;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S, M (a drop of sweat)

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Effect ray
Duration 1 min./level
Saving Throw Fortitude partial; see text; Spell Resistance yes

Description

This spell functions as ray of exhaustion, except the target is sickened if it fails its save and unaffected if it makes its save.
